markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spew Tentacles](/Feats.aspx?ID=2531) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles. You can cast [_black tentacles_](/Spells.aspx?ID=23) once per day as an innate occult spell, though when you do so, you spew them from your mouth out to the appropriate range, where they take root and begin [Grappling](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) creatures as usual. The tentacles recognize you as a part of them and don't attempt to Grapple you, even if you are in the area.
name: Spew Tentacles

summary_markdown: You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Spew Tentacles Source Ancestry Guide pg. 93 2.0 --- You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles. You can cast black tentacles once per day as an innate occult spell, though when you do so, you spew them from your mouth out to the appropriate range, where they take root and begin Grappling creatures as usual. The tentacles recognize you as a part of them and don't attempt to Grapple you, even if you are in the area.
